title: The Last Single Girl
description: An alternate cover edition can be found here.One month. That's all Sarah has to find a date for the Big Night or earn the honor of being the last single girl in her inner circle. Actually, in all her circles. So with four weeks to find Mr. Right and a frienemy already counting her out, Sarah joins eLove.com hoping that - just like the perfect purse - the internet and online dating can help her find the perfect man. The problem is, love isn't always where you think you'll find it and Mr. Right may not be the one with the shiniest profile.Page Count: This Romantic Comedy novella is 23k words, or by NY standards 92 pages.
author: Caitie Quinn
